1. 抵制不良游戏，拒绝盗版游戏。
2. 注意自我保护，谨防受骗上当。

4. 合理安排时间，享受健康生活。

Kelas Extreme merupakan kelas yang benar - benar terlatih dengan sangat keras dan dominan. Hasilnya mereka sangatlah kuat dan dominan dalam pertarungan. Mereka dapat mengkombinasikan berbagai kelas skill yang mereka inginkan. Link skill adalah yang paling
利用觉醒研习各职业技能的终极部，以强化世界为目标。可以使用各职业的防具和武器。与其他职业相比之下，拥有2种特性：敏捷+力量、力量+精神、敏捷+精神等，可以发挥更强大的力量。终极部专用武器可以使用全部类型的技能。

Extreme Class is consist of well-trained and prominent students who got their strength fervently powerful while having been trained for immense abilities to control the war in order to eradicate enemies. They can combine and utilize all the classes' skills dependent on what they want to be. Link skills are one of the most enormous and dominant features of Extreme Class.

Kelas Swordsman adalah kelas yang berlatih paling keras dari semuanya. Mereka mengfokuskan diri di bagian tenaga dan pertahanan. Kelas ini adalah kelas dengan pertahanan paling tinggi yang membuat mereka selalu dibutuhkan di semua party sebagai barisan pa
剑道部角色善长近身战，拥有相当高的体力和攻击力。使用剑或是刀来战斗。根据使用的武器，剑道部角色会有不同类型的发展，并且使用不同的技能。

Swordman students endure the most rigorous training, focused to develop great precision, strength and agility. Students from this Class have been welcomed because of the highest defense and diverse skills which make them formidable opponents in PVP and PVE. They aim for swift, clean, fatal strikes in battle.

Kelas Archer adalah kelas dengan akurasi serangan tertinggi. Mereka menggabungkan skill untuk menghindar mereka dan menyerang musuh dengan kecepatan tinggi. Teman party paling cocok di game karena serangan jarak jauhnya yang mematikan. Mereka hampir tidak
弓箭部的角色虽然体力较少，但是擅长在远距离狙击敌人。根据角色所使用的武器（长弓与短弓），而细分为不同的类型。

The true mark of Archery graduates is that they never miss their targets. Their skill with the bow is matchless, and their speed is supreme. Great allies in every battle, these students are the masters of long ranged combat. They are unstoppable once they let loose their arrows. Their superior evasion skills are their greatest defense.

Kelas Brawler diajarkan untuk mengeksploitasi kekuatan tersembunyi yang ada di dalam tubuh mereka dan memanfaatkannya sebagai senjata utama. Hanya murid dengan point tertinggi di bagian tenaga dan penempatan yang dapat lulus di kelas ini. Brawlers merupak
格斗部角色使用各类格斗技能来进行战斗。根据其成长模式，可发展成使用气功，或是以拳脚见长的武斗家。

Brawler students are taught to harness the latent power stored deep within their bodies as their greatest weapon. Only students that earned high scores in the strength and coordination tests qualify for this course since Brawlers have shunned all armed conflict and choose to embrace combat in its purest, basest form instead. They study to master the art of close range combat.

Kelas Shaman menggunakan tenaga psikokinesis. Tugas mereka adalah membantu murid lain. Mereka dapat melemahkan musuh mereka dengan POW skill. Memberi buff yang berguna dengan DEX skill. Atau mensupport dengan INT skill. Kelas ini lumayan susah karena meru
气功部是由一群使用念力的学生组成的部门。扮演着阻止其他学生不正当行为和给予实质上协助的角色。运用力量弱化敌人的能力，利用敏捷给予队员Buff效果。精神力可直接治愈、和使用Buff。队伍中扮演的角色会随着学习的技能内容而变化，角色难易度属于中等以上。

Shaman Class is composed of the students with psychokinetic power. They can help other students or prevent their misbehavior. They can weaken their enemies with POW skills and cast beneficial buff to party members using DEX skills. They also utilize INT skills for direct buff and cure. The Shaman Class has an intermediate difficulty or above since their role within the party is clearly distinguished by each skill composition.
比起让他们锻炼身体或是灵魂觉醒，崔博士反倒是透过这群利用科学特性进行强化的学生社团、枪的物质转换机、自己的科学知识来掌控。超能部根据使用的武器和技能共细分为化学、生物、物理3种。化学系可降低对方的能力、生物系可限制对方的行动或是解除解异常状态效果、物理系则是利用召唤兽进行强大的攻击。

Science club is a squad of students who protect themselves with a special chemical weapon. Science club can be further classified into Physics Club, Chemistry Club, and Biology Club based on their weapon and skill type. Chemistry club students protect themselves by hindering enemy abilities, Biology club students can block enemy movement or dispel buffs, while Physics club can attack enemies with latest physics technologies.

Science club adalah sekelompok pelajar yang melindungi diri mereka dengan alat kimia khusus berbentuk senjata api yang lebih cenderung memanfaatkan ilmu pengetahuan daripada menggunakan kekuatan spiritual maupun fisik biasa. Menurut jenis senjata dan skil
混战时期，当有人身陷危机时，他们总是无声无息出现后消失，脸上始终带面纱和面具。发生异变和现实世界隔绝后，开始掩饰自己的身分。因为他们特殊的行为模式如同小说电影中出现的忍者，久而久之大家开始称他们为忍者。

Cold hearted secret agents who had to become the darkness in order to fulfill their duties are the masters of many weapons but they specialize in the three rare weapons. Assassin divided into 3 types including Eliminator, Infiltrator and Rogue.
Agen rahasia berhati dingin yang berubah menjadi agen kegelapan karena efek jahat. Mereka dapat menggunakan berbagai senjata, namun lebih memfokuskan diri kepada Eliminator, Infiltrator dan Rogue.
此学部集结了把魔术应用在战斗中的学生. 使用快捷的手法，各种各样的装置和戏法等不可思议的魔法来压制敌人. 以魔术箱，鞭子，魔术棒作为武器. 武器的不同会影响到使用的魔术类型，且技能很炫丽. 且有着不错的攻击力和不低的防御力. 在PVP/PVE造成混乱. 总体的玩法不单一，而且要求中上的控制手法.

Magician Class is composed of the students who have developed their exclusive strength for battles from magic skills. Sleight-of-hand moves and a range of devices, tricks show how these incredibly clever students could suppress their enemies. The main items of magicians are Cubes, Whips, and Magic Wands. Battle style goes with a weapon type and the effects of them are just sleek and classy enough.
Sacred Gate adalah kampus pertama yang dibangun oleh Saint Foundation. Kampus ini terletak di bagian barat dari dunia RAN. Menawarkan infrastuktur untuk para murid shaman dan bela diri.
Sacred Gate Campus是圣财团的第一所特殊教育机关。有传闻说在学院的地下室正偷偷进行各种研究异世界的实验。
Sacred Gate Campus is the first campus built by the Saint Foundation. Boasting Eastern infrastructures and designs, this campus is dedicated to Shaman and Martial arts research.
Mystic Peak adalah kampus kedua yang dibangun oleh Saint Foundation. Kampus ini terletak di bagian utara dari dunia RAN. Menawarkan akademi untuk seni dan penelitian alam.
Mystic Peak是圣财团的第三个特殊教育机关。与其他两个教育机关一起在四周组成结界，学生大都来自于上流社会的家庭，因此有着高雅的气质，被公开的称为艺术专科学校。
Mystic Peak is the second campus built by the Saint Foundation and located in the northern region of RAN world. The atmosphere reflects the academy's dedication to the Arts and Natural Science.
Phoenix adalah kampus ketiga yang dibangun oleh Saint Foundation. Kampus ini terletak di bagian selatan dari dunia RAN. Menawarkan teknologi untuk para ahli dan ilmuan.
Phoenix是圣财团的第二个特殊教育机关。外表上是理工专科学校，实际上教育内容与其他学校并无不同。学校被评为三个学校当中最不受拘束管理的学校。
Phoenix is the third campus built by the Saint Foundation. The campus is located in the southern region of RAN world. Offers the engineers and scientists advanced technology.
Silahkan pilih style rambut dan muka
Please select the hair style and face type.
请选择所属国家，否则无法进入游戏。
Please select your country or you will be not allowed to access the game.
Silahkan pilih negaramu atau kamu tidak dapat mengakses game.
File game guard telah rusak atau hilang. Silahkan instal ulang game guard.
GameGuard档案不存在；或有损坏。请再尝试安装GameGuard 的安装档。
GameGuard file does not exist or might be corrupted. Please try to install GameGuard again.
File sistem window telah rusak. Silahkan instal ulang internet explorer(IE).
Window的某部份系统档案受损。请重新安装浏览器IE（ Internet Explorer）。
Window system files might be corrupted. Please try to install Internet Explorer (IE) again.
Terjadi error ketika game guard sedang dijalankan. Silahkan kirim semua file *.erl yang berada di dalam folder game guard ke Game2@inca.co.kr via email.
GameGuard执行时发现错误。请将游戏资料夹里的GameGuard资料夹中的*.erl档案随电子邮件附加寄到Game2@inca.co.kr信箱。
Error occurred while running the GameGuard. Please send all *.erl files in the GameGuard folder to Game2@inca.co.kr via e-mail.
Proses menjalankan game guard telah gagal. Silahkan instal ulang file setup game guard.
GameGuard执行失败。请重新执行GameGuard安装档。
Failed to run GameGuard. Please try reinstalling GameGuard setup file.
Game guard sedang dijalankan. Silahkan reboot komputer kemudian ulangi dari awal.
GameGuard执行中。稍等一会或是重新启动之后再执行。
GameGuard is already running. Try to run the game later or after rebooting the computer.
Terjadi duplikat sesi atau game guard sedang dijalankan. Silahkan keluar dari game dan ulangi lagi.
GameGuard已在执行中。结束游戏后；或是重新电脑开机后，再重新执行GameGuard。
GameGuard is already running. Try to run the game later or after reboot the computer.
Telah ditemukan program ilegal . Silahkan matikan program yang tidak dibutuhkan dan ulangi game dari awal.
发现非法程式。请结束不需要的程式之后重新执行。
Illegal program has been detected. Close all unnecessary programs and try again.
Error inisialisasi game guard. Reboot komputer kemudian ulangi game dari awal atau matikan program lain yang mengganggu game.
GameGuard初始化发生错误。请重新启动后再执行；或是关闭可能会有冲突的程式之后，再进行执行。
GameGuard initialization error. Please reboot and try to run again or close any programs that may have conflict with GameGuard.
Pengambilan modul scanning virus dan hacking tool telah gagal. Memori komputer tidak cukup atau terinfeksi virus.
无法加载模组检查病毒和駭客工具。可能是记忆体不足或是感染了病毒。
Failed to load the modules for checking viruses and hacking tools. Might be causes of insufficient system memory or virus infection.
File game atau game guard telah rusak.
Update game guard telah gagal. Silahkan cek koneksi internet atau firewall setting komputer Anda.
GameGuard升级取消。如果一直无法连线，请先调整网路或个人的防火墙设定。
GameGuard update has stopped. Please check your internet connection or personal firewall settings.
Update game guard tidak sempurna. Silahkan matikan sementara program Anti-Virus kemudian ulangi lagi atau cek setting program PC manager, apabila ada.
GameGuard改版升级无法完成。请先停止执行防毒程式后，再重新执行。或是调整PC管理程式设定后，再进行执行。
Failed to complete GameGuard update. Please disable any anti virus and try to update again, or check the PC management programs setting.
Koneksi server untuk update game guard telah gagal. Silahkan coba lagi atau cek firewall setting komputer Anda.
GameGuard改版(升级)伺服连线失败。稍等之后再重新执行。如果有个人防火墙，请调整个人防火墙设定之后再尝试。
Failed to connect to GameGuard update server. Please try again later or check your personal firewall settings.
点选右边按键画面，将显示至下一阶段前所剩怪物数量。
우측의 돋보기 버튼을 클릭하시면 다음 레벨에 도달하기까지 남은 몬스터 수를 화면에 표시할 수 있습니다.
우측의 돋보기 버튼을 클릭하시면 다음 레벨에 도달하기까지 남은 몬스터 수를 화면에 표시할 수 있습니다.
虽然不是很强，不过最好不要同时攻击超过8只怪物。
Not too strong. But don't fight with more than 8 mobs.
Tidak terlalu kuat. Namun jangan melakukan mobbing lebih dari 8 monster.
非常强悍，很难同时攻击2只以上的怪物。
Very strong. It's difficult to kill more than 2 mobs at once.
Sangat kuat. Sulit untuk melakukan mobbing.
拥有最强的攻击力可以把你一次击倒。
Strong enough to kill you in one hit.
Cukup kuat untuk membunuh kamu dalam satu hit.
攻击力普通。可轻而易举同时攻击8只以上。
Weak. It's easy to kill more than 8 mobs at once.
Lemah. Mudah untuk membunuh 8 mobs bersamaan.
密码至少要6个字以上14个以下.
Password must be at least 4 characters and less than 16 characters.
Masukkan user ID dan password ke dua untuk setting informasi.
若忘记了第二道密码，请按下修正按钮。
Please input your ID and 2nd password to login in the website.
There is a button to modify if you lost your 2nd password.
帐号和密码不可以相同
User ID dan password tidak boleh sama.
Password cannot be same with ID.
帐号和密码的第一个字不能使用数字
User ID dan password tidak boleh diawali dengan angka.
ID and password cannot begin with a number.
密码必须是8位以上16位以下。
Password must be at least 8 characters and less than 16 characters long.
Masukkan password ke dua untuk setting informasi.
输入第2道密码以确认用户资讯。对于Ran Online来说，第二道密码是非常重要的资料。
Please enter the 2nd password for identification.
The 2nd password is very important infrormation for Ran Online Service.

可选择加入已成立之公会。

Would you like to join the club before you start the game?

If you click cancel, you will be reconnect.
